mapper.insert: insert into TEOrgMember (OrgMemberID, OrgID, Name, Sex, Ethnicity, Politics, CertID, BirthDate, LevelTypeValue, PositionTypeValue, Education, MobileTel, FixedTel, Status) values (#{orgMemberID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ethnicity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{politics,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{levelTypeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionTypeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fixedTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update TEOrgMember set OrgID = #{orgID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Ethnicity = #{ethnicity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Politics = #{politics,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CertID = #{certID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BirthDate = #{birthDate,jdbcType=DATE}, LevelTypeValue = #{levelTypeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PositionTypeValue = #{positionTypeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MobileTel = #{mobileTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FixedTel = #{fixedTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where OrgMemberID = #{orgMemberID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select OrgMemberID, OrgID, Name, Sex, Ethnicity, Politics, CertID, BirthDate, LevelTypeValue, PositionTypeValue, Education, MobileTel, FixedTel, Status from TEOrgMember where OrgMemberID = #{orgMemberID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select OrgMemberID, OrgID, Name, Sex, Ethnicity, Politics, CertID, BirthDate, LevelTypeValue, PositionTypeValue, Education, MobileTel, FixedTel, Status from TEOrgMember
select OrgMemberID from TEOrgMember where Name=#{name} and CertID=#{certID}
